properties.displayName: MDE Alert - Suspicious registration of an accessibility debugger under the IFEO registry key
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "Suspicious registration of an accessibility debugger under the IFEO registry key"
| where MitreTechnique == "T1546.008;T1546.012"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - Suspicious registration of an accessibility debugger under the IFEO registry key - Mitre Techniques T1546.008,T1546.012
